title: [mkl]Fix gcc6.3 build link issue
body_html:
when we build tensorflow with gcc6.3 cpu it will meet the errors below, this PR will fix this issue.

In file included from tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/fully_connected.cc:28:0:
./tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/optimized_ops.h: In function 'void tflite::optimized_ops::LogSoftmax(const uint8*, const tflite::Dims<4>&, int32, int32, int32, int32, int, uint8*, const tflite::Dims<4>&)':
./tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/optimized_ops.h:4577:53: warning: typedef 'using FixedPoint0 = class gemmlowp::FixedPoint<int, 0>' locally defined but not used [-Wunused-local-typedefs]
using FixedPoint0 = gemmlowp::FixedPoint<int32, 0>;
^
ERROR: /home/tensorflow/code/1/dl_framework-intel_tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:2830:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/core:lib_strings_stringprintf_test' failed (Exit 1)
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/libexternal_Scom_Ugoogle_Uabsl_Sabsl_Sbase_Slibbase.so: error: undefined reference to 'pthread_key_create'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/libexternal_Scom_Ugoogle_Uabsl_Sabsl_Sbase_Slibbase.so: error: undefined reference to 'pthread_getspecific'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/libexternal_Scom_Ugoogle_Uabsl_Sabsl_Sbase_Slibbase.so: error: undefined reference to 'pthread_setspecific'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/libexternal_Scom_Ugoogle_Uabsl_Sabsl_Sbase_Slibbase.so: error: undefined reference to 'pthread_sigmask'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/_U@mkl_Ulinux_S_S_Cmkl_Ulibs_Ulinux___Uexternal_Smkl_Ulinux_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dladdr'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/_U@mkl_Ulinux_S_S_Cmkl_Ulibs_Ulinux___Uexternal_Smkl_Ulinux_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlopen'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/_U@mkl_Ulinux_S_S_Cmkl_Ulibs_Ulinux___Uexternal_Smkl_Ulinux_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlerror'
bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/_solib_k8/_U@mkl_Ulinux_S_S_Cmkl_Ulibs_Ulinux___Uexternal_Smkl_Ulinux_Slib/libmklml_intel.so: error: undefined reference to 'dlsym'

Signed-off-by: shaohua shaohua.zhang@intel.com

when we build tensorflow with gcc6.3 cpu  it will meet the errors below, this PR will fix this issue.


In file included from tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/fully_connected.cc:28:0:
./tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/optimized_ops.h: In function 'void tflite::optimized_ops::LogSoftmax(const uint8*, const tflite::Dims<4>&, int32, int32, int32, int32, int, uint8*, const tflite::Dims<4>&)':

   using FixedPoint0 = gemmlowp::FixedPoint<int32, 0>;
